name: Righteous Path (Game Jam Title)
description:
Navigate your way through various mazes to the golden square to keep the balance of the universe in 'Righteous Path'! Play as either Justice or Chaos with a friend and see who wins!

Developer note:

This game has been a tricky one. After doing a game jam last week and feeling a little burnt out, I have tried to do my best in uploading this before the deadline. What I have learned from this is that I should probably take a break from game jams and try to make a longer term project that is of better quality. That way I can create something a lot more fun next time.

Also this game is a little broken. When teleporting to a random room/maze you may be taken back to the title screen, but luckily your score will be kept (hopefully). 

5 colours used: black, white, grey, purple and yellow.

Thank you for your time.

-Caleb (LebbyFoxx)
